# Issue 12: Add DevTools Architecture Diagram to Documentation

Create visual diagrams (Mermaid, PlantUML, or draw.io) showing DevTools architecture.

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] **Component diagram** (clients, server, game apps, ECS)
- [ ] **Sequence diagram** (command execution flow)
- [ ] **Deployment diagram** (dev/CI/prod environments)
- [ ] **Security diagram** (defense layers)
- [ ] Embedded in RFCs or separate doc

## Location

`docs/rfcs/diagrams/`

- `documentation`
- `dev-tools`
- `architecture`
